import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Banner1, Banner2, Banner3, Banner4, Banner5, GameIcon, ListrikIcon, MusikIcon, PaketDataIcon, PBBIcon, PDAMIcon, PGNIcon, PulsaIcon, QurbanIcon, TevelisiIcon, VoucherMakananIcon, ZakatIcon, } from "../assets/icon"; import { HomeIcons, Header, InfoUserSaldo } from "../components"; function HomePage() { return (
Temukan Promo Menarik
); } export default HomePage;
